QuestData.Title: The Dark Heart of Oshu'gun
QuestData.Description: Amongst the timeworn wreckage of the Genedar is the entrance to the vessel's inner chamber. The void energy appears to be most concentrated in that place.$b$bYou must enter the inner chamber and face whatever evil lurks within. I fear whatever fate may have befallen the great naaru K'ure in that place, but regardless the evil there must be purged.$b$bMay the Light be with you, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Sanctum of the Naaru.
QuestData.RewardText: The fate of K'ure could not have been prevented.$b$bCho'gall accelerated the naaru's transition into a void god in hopes of bringing destruction upon Draenor. Cho'gall must be dealt with, but for now let us honor the memory of the great naaru K'ure.$b$bK'ure was truly the savior of my people, a friend to the virtuous, and a teacher of prophets.$b$bMay the great naaru ever live within our hearts.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Sanctum of the Naaru
